overview: Paul Pratt's trips away never seem to go his way. Every escort he orders up ends up being late, cocky or unwilling to feed his sexual appetite to his liking. Unfortunately for them, Paul's got another appetite to fill whether these escorts are willing to fill it or not. With some resisting more than others Paul has his way in spanking these five asses to gratifying shades of red.
title: Spanking Scorts 2
